meanings.definition: A rare barium-rich member of the pyrochlore supergroup, with formula (Ca,Na,Ba)₂Nb₂O₆(OH,F).
meanings.english_definition: A rare barium-rich member of the pyrochlore supergroup, with formula (Ca,Na,Ba)₂Nb₂O₆(OH,F).

examples.sentence: The mineral flinkite is found in association with other rare earth minerals.
examples.translation: 鉱物フリンク石は、他の希土類鉱物と共に見られます。

etymology.value: Named after Gustav Flink, a Swedish mineralogist.
